document.full_text: not raising the u.s. debt ceiling would be bad for the economy and would force the government to default on either its bonds or domestic programs, the top white house economist said on thursday.
document.title: u.s. to suffer if debt limit not raised: white house
lines_and_colors: not raising the u.s. debt ceiling would be bad for the economy and would force the government to default on either its bonds or domestic programs, the top white house economist said on thursday.
